messages.subject: Re: End of year testing
messages.msgSnippet: ... reading ... end ... progress.  It ... California ... Achievement ... there ... nervous ... passing one ... It depends on your state. In Hawaii it seemed
messages.messageBody:
--- In unschoolingbasics@yahoogroups.com, "Lorena Cole" <Lorena@...>
wrote:
>
> Hi,
>
> My 13 year old daughter & I are new to unschooling. As I was
reading
> through information the school has sent me, it states that at the
end
> of the year a test muct be administered to see the childs
progress. It
> does state I get to choose from: Iowa test of basic skills;
California
> Achievement test; Stanford achievement test; Metropolitan
Achievement
> Test or a state Education Department test. I was wondering if
there
> are any practice tests she could take for she is getting very
nervous
> that June is coming so quickly. I tried googling them put it only
> explains what they are.
>
> Does anyone have any suggestions or any related material in
passing one
> of these test?
>
> Thanks!!!
>
> Lorena
> www.marketamerica.com/lifespossibilities
>
It depends on your state. In Hawaii it seemed that they required
periodic testing but at the very end of the law it stated that a
portfolio or other statement showing progress could be presented.
Read the actual state law before you do anything.

Alysia

messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] End of year testing
messages.msgSnippet: Lorena, What state are you in? Lorena Cole  wrote: Hi, My 13 year old daughter & I are new to unschooling. As I was
messages.messageBody:
Lorena,
What state are you in?

Lorena Cole <Lorena@...> wrote:
Hi,

My 13 year old daughter & I are new to unschooling. As I was reading
through information the school has sent me, it states that at the end
of the year a test muct be administered to see the childs progress. It
does state I get to choose from: Iowa test of basic skills; California
Achievement test; Stanford achievement test; Metropolitan Achievement
Test or a state Education Department test. I was wondering if there
are any practice tests she could take for she is getting very nervous
that June is coming so quickly. I tried googling them put it only
explains what they are.

Does anyone have any suggestions or any related material in passing one
of these test?

Thanks!!!

Lorena
www.marketamerica.com/lifespossibilities

messages.subject: End of year testing
messages.msgSnippet: Hi, My 13 year old daughter & I are new to unschooling.  As I was reading through information the school has sent me, it states that at the end of the year a
messages.messageBody:
Hi,

My 13 year old daughter & I are new to unschooling. As I was reading
through information the school has sent me, it states that at the end
of the year a test muct be administered to see the childs progress. It
does state I get to choose from: Iowa test of basic skills; California
Achievement test; Stanford achievement test; Metropolitan Achievement
Test or a state Education Department test. I was wondering if there
are any practice tests she could take for she is getting very nervous
that June is coming so quickly. I tried googling them put it only
explains what they are.

Does anyone have any suggestions or any related material in passing one
of these test?

Thanks!!!

Lorena
www.marketamerica.com/lifespossibilities
